subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Brian Boucher and Michael Leighton are each 2-0 this season when the Flyers faced playoff elimination. But neither was very effective in Philadelphia’s 7-4 loss to Chicago on Sunday.
snippet: Brian Boucher and Michael Leighton are each 2-0 this season when the Flyers faced playoff elimination. But neither was very effective in Philadelphia’s 7-4 loss to Chicago on Sunday.
